aboutV2.title: Learn about the author
aboutV2.subtitle: ABOUT THE AUTHOR
aboutV2.description: According to wikipedia, Colleen Hoover is an American author who primarily writes novels in the romance and young adult fiction genres. She is best known for her 2016 romance novel, It Ends with Us. Many of her works were self-published, before being picked up by a publishing house.

userInfo.title: Address:
userInfo.subtitle: 06 DOYERS ST. 8 ARLINGTON DR. 599 NW BAY BLVD
